house_listing.house_description: This 2 level detached single family home built in 1987 has 4 bedroom(s), 2.75 bath(s) , 1 car attached garage and approximately 2667 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room, living room, bonus room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio, fireplace, air conditioning, double door entry.
house_listing.firm_name: Fred Sands Hillhurst Fred Sands Hillhurst

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Bonus Room, Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master
